text:
Berkeley, CA - One block from Berkeley BART

Shirts.io is a t-shirt printing and fulfillment platform. Our company currently prints a million shirts every couple months. We are growing rapidly.

We are looking for:

* A back-end (Django/Python) developer

* A front-end (Javascript/HTML) developer

You'll get a competitive salary and unlimited t-shirts. To apply, send an email to jobs@shirts.io.
